name: Lavazza Espresso Favorites Collection of Aluminum Capsules Compatible with Nespresso* Original Machines, Contains Light, Medium, and Dark Espresso Roast (60 Capsules)
short_description: ESPRESSO FAVORITES COLLECTON: 60 single-serve capsules ideal for espresso preparation.
INTENSITY AND ROASTING: With a variety of intensities, this pack features light, medium, and dark roast capsules.

BLEND: Made from a variety of either 100% Arabica or a blend of Arabica and Robusta beans, these naturally caffeinated blends are sourced from around the world - Central/South America, Africa, and Asia.
AROMATIC NOTES: Featuring a full variety of notes such as chocolate, florals, fruit, and more.
INGREDIENTS: Lavazza Capsules contain only coffee, and are produced in facilities that exclusively make coffee.
product_description: Enjoy this 60-count variety pack and find your favorite blend! Included is one pack of Super Crema, our best selling blend, one pack of Espresso Maestro Classico, our signature medium roast with notes of grains and biscotti; Espresso Maestro Intenso, a medium-dark roast with notes of wood and spices to create a divine aftertaste; Espresso Maestro Ristretto, a dark roast featuring notes of chocolate and caramel; Espresso Maestro Lungo, a velvety light roast highlighted by floral and fruity notes; and Espresso Maestro Dek, a well-balanced blend with notes of dried fruit and chocolate.

name: ROSSO CAFFÈ Espresso Coffee Pods for Nespresso Original Machines - 80 Capsules Variety Pack, 8 Signature Flavors, Medium to Dark Roast - Made in Italy
short_description: Reserve Edition - Premium Espresso Pods Variety Pack: Discover the best espresso flavors - luxury selection of 8 signature specialty coffee blends, crafted to satisfy with every sip. From bold and intense to smooth and balanced, each espresso capsule is designed to deliver a rich café-quality experience at home.

Crafted with Care - Premium Coffee Beans, Roasted to Flavor: We use sustainably grown beans sourced from Central and South America, Africa, and Vietnam. Hand-picked, carefully roasted, and sealed for freshness, our pods deliver consistent quality and exceptional espresso in every cup.

Recyclable Aluminum Pods for Freshness and Sustainability: Each Rosso Caffè pod is made from airtight, recyclable aluminum to preserve flavor, crema, and aroma. After brewing, compost the grounds and recycle the aluminum capsule - coffee pods that taste great and support a sustainable future.

We're committed to your experience. If you encounter any issues with our espresso capsules or compatibility, feel free to contact Rosso Caffè through your Amazon order history - we’re here to assist and make things right.
Compatible with Nespresso Original Line Machines: Our espresso pods are fully compatible with all Nespresso Original Line machines (not compatible with Vertuo Line or other systems).

name: Gran Caffè Garibaldi Espresso Pods, Italian Roasted Coffee, Compatible Nespresso Original Line Machines, Nitrogen Flushed, Full-Bodied Crema, Almond & Dried Fruit - Dolce Aroma 50 Aluminum Cups
short_description: ITALIAN ROASTED FLAVOR: Gran Caffè Garibaldi Dolce Aroma capsules feature a rich blend of 70% Arabica and 30% Robusta beans, offering bold espresso flavors, hazelnut crema, and notes of almond and dried fruit for an intense, satisfying coffee experience.

SEALED FOR FRESHNESS: Each pod is nitrogen-flushed and made with aluminum to preserve intense aroma and rich flavor, ensuring your espresso tastes freshly brewed every time you use it in your Nespresso Original machine.

COMPATIBLE DESIGN: Crafted to fit seamlessly with Nespresso Original machines, these capsules deliver a smooth brewing process and consistent results, providing a professional-quality coffee experience at home.

PREMIUM COFFEE PODS: Enjoy light roast coffee with a caffeinated blend for a flavorful cup. Perfect for single or double caff brewing, these espresso capsules are ideal for daily use with Nespresso machines.

CONVENIENT BREWING: Designed for simplicity and reliability, these coffee capsules offer a mess-free, quick brew for a delicious espresso every time. Perfect for home or office use, with each pack containing 10 recyclable pods.

name: Peet's Coffee, Dark Roast Espresso Capsules, Compatible with Nespresso Original Machine, 100% Arabica Coffee - Ristretto Intensity 10, 100 Count (10 Boxes of 10 Espresso Capsules)
short_description: Contains ten (10) Boxes of 10 Peet's Ristretto - Intensity 10 Dark Roast Coffee Single Cup Espresso Capsules (100 Espresso Capsules Total)
Flavor and Roast: Dark Roast - Intensity 10. Notes of crushed spiced and rich chocolate, evoking a class "short pull" espresso. 100% Arabica Coffee

Peet's Espresso Capsules are compatible with the Nespresso Original Machines*, Essenza Mini, Essenza Plus, Pixie, CitiZ, Lattissima, KitchenAid, and Creatista Nespresso Original machines.* Not compatible with Nespresso Vertuo machines. *Peet's is not affiliated with the Nespresso brand.
Recyclable: Peet's aluminum capsules are recyclable through our mail-back program. Each aluminum capsule is sealed to preserve that delicious aroma and flavor for an intense espresso experience
How to Brew: Peet's capsules work with Ristretto (0.85 OZ / 25 ml) or Espresso (1.35 OZ / 40 ml) pulls on your brewer.
product_description: Peet's Ristretto Espresso Intensity 10 Dark Roast Coffee is is like a concentrated "short pull" espresso made by one of our baristas, delivering a sumptuous truffle of flavor, showing crushed spiced, rich fruit and chocolate smoothness. Peet's Espresso is available in a convenient aluminum capsule that fits your Nespresso Original machine*. Made with 100% Arabica coffee, each capsule delivers the rich, high-quality coffee experience that you expect from Peet's. Plus, the aluminum capsules are fully recyclable through our mail-back program. Each capsule is sealed to preserve aromas and deliver a more intense espresso experience and a richer, smoother, and creamier foam.*Peet's is not affiliated with the Nespresso® brand.

name: ROSSO CAFFÈ 60 Espresso Coffee Pods for Nespresso Original Machines - Premium Capsule Sampler Variety Pack 6 Flavors, Rich Breakfast to Intense Roasts
short_description: Original 60 Edition: Explore a rich selection of 6 distinct espresso blends - from smooth and balanced to bold and intense. This carefully curated assortment delivers café-quality flavor, rich crema, and variety in every cup - perfect for any mood or moment.

Expertly Crafted by Global Coffee Masters: We source high-quality beans from top coffee regions worldwide. Our coffee experts oversee the entire process - from farm to roast - to create unique blends that meet Specialty Coffee Association standards.
Compatible with Nespresso Original Line Machines: Rosso Caffè intense espresso pods are designed for all Nespresso Original Line machines (not compatible with Vertuo or any other systems).

60-Capsule Variety Pack Featuring Our Most Popular Blends: Enjoy a curated mix of our best-selling aluminum espresso pods. Whether you prefer rich and smooth, fruity and strong, woody and complex, round and full-bodied, or soft and balanced - there’s a favorite in every sleeve.

Freshness Locked In, Sustainability Built In: Each pod is sealed in airtight, recyclable aluminum to preserve aroma, crema, and flavor. Used grounds can be composted, and the capsule goes straight to the recycling bin. No waste - just great coffee.

name: Lavazza Espresso Capsules Compatible with Nespresso Original Machines Variety Pack, 10 Count (Pack of 6)
short_description: 6 Packs of 10 single serve Nespresso pods of the Armonico (2 boxes), Decaffeinato Ricco, Avvolgente, Leggero, and Deciso coffee blends (60 cups total)
Blends range from medium roast to dark, espresso roasts and intensities of 4 to 10 out of 13
Armonico espresso and leggero lungo blends are 100 percent Arabica
Blended and roasted in Italy
Can only be brewed using a Nespresso OriginalLine machine
product_description: No matter how you take your coffee, Lavazza has a blend and preparation to perfectly fit into your coffee ritual. Four generations of the Lavazza family have dedicated over 125 years to sourcing the best blends of coffee beans from all over the world to bring you an unmistakable taste and aroma that is uniquely Lavazza. This Lavazza Nespresso Capsule Variety Pack includes: 20 Nespresso pods of Lavazza Armonico Espresso dark roast coffee blend (hints of toasted cereals and caramel), 10 Nespresso pods of Lavazza Decaffeinato Ricco Espresso dark roast decaffeinated coffee blend (aromatic notes of cereals and dried fruit), 10 Nespresso pods of Lavazza Avvolgente Lungo dark roast coffee blend (hints of cocoa and spices), 10 Nespresso pods of Lavazza Leggero Lungo medium roast coffee blend (fruity and floral notes), and 10 Nespresso pods of Lavazza Deciso Espresso dark roast coffee blend (notes of cocoa and wood). These blends allow for a variety of delightfully sippable cups of coffee using a Nespresso* Original Line machine. Enjoy a premium experience where every small moment can be savored. *Lavazza is not affiliated with, endorsed or sponsored by Nespresso

short_description: Contains four (4) boxes of Café Bustelo espresso capsules (10 capsules per box)
Made from dark roast coffee with an irresistible aroma
Rich, full-bodied flavor
Stands up to milk and sugar

product_description: ¡Disfruta el sabor latino! This Café Bustelo espresso coffee blend is a dark roast coffee with an irresistible aroma. Every sip delivers deliciously rich, full-bodied flavor to ensure a coffee experience that stands out, with or without cream or sugar — ideal for the perfect cafecito and other Latin-style espresso beverages. And thanks to these single serve aluminum espresso capsules, you can brew this authentic Latin flavor using any Nespresso Original Line machine. (Café Bustelo is not affiliated with, endorsed or sponsored by Nespresso.) ¡Rápido y fácil! Fuel your day the Latin way with this delicious Café Bustelo espresso coffee blend.
